top.title: Thousands without power in freezing Ukraine as renewed Russian strikes continue
top.summary: Ukraine's leader says regions including Kyiv and Kharkiv are among those suffering the most from blackouts as a result of recent attacks.

top.title: Melinda French Gates says ex-husband Bill has questions to answer over Epstein
top.summary: She said her ex-husband and others named in the Epstein files needed to answer whatever questions remain.

top.title: Andrew and Epstein asked exotic dancer for 'sex acts,' legal letter claims

top.title: Netflix and Warner Bros struggle to defend merger
top.summary: Concerns were raised by a subcommittee including potential price rises and the future of cinemas.

top.title: Pinterest sacks engineers for tracking staff job cuts
top.summary: The social media platform recently announced that it was axing around 15% of its workforce.

top.title: X offices raided in France as UK opens fresh investigation into Grok
top.summary: Elon Musk's X and Grok platforms are facing increased scrutiny from authorities on both sides of the channel.
